name: Apartment RUJAN
middle: At an exclusive location, in the heart of Zlatibor, we expect you and your friends to enjoy together. Is it necessary to talk about the beauty of this mountain where the winds meet, where the air is full of oxygen, not exhaust gases, crowds and shouting?! You will feel special in our apartment, especially after long walks in the nature of a beautiful and unique mountain!
aside-text1: The apartment is newly built, clean and equipped with all the necessary things ready to enhance your stay on this beautiful mountain!
aside-text3: To book directly, you can contact us by phone, email or book online through Booking.
footer-left: For all questions, reservations, doubts... We are here for you! Call us!
